body:
Thanks for 100 subs. In return, I'm releasing my 3 private packs. Because I got to 100 subs I recorded + edited an entire showcase + minitage with two injured fingers (left hand, my keyboard hand, my middle and ring fingers got hyperextended when I fell off my bike). 
I was finding it hard due to recent events and injuries, but for 100 I felt I had to ;p 
Thanks a lot, as Ik a decent portion of my subs came from avi ;)

Packs/Minitage:
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e2quEIr_0PU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e2quEIr_0PU 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e2quEIr_0PU

title: 100 Subs, Packs and Thank You

replies.body:
Damn thats commitement right there :P 
Sick packs, not a fan of the short swords but overall great packs
